definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: (dub.) rush, of storm-wind (cf. Ar. sa9ay (and s9w), go quickly, run, be energetic; Syr. s9o0 make an attack upon);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. fs. [[מֵרוּחַ סׂעָה]] Ps 55:9 from rushing wind (and) from tempest ([[סָָעַר]]); Hup (not Now) Gr Dy [[סוּפָה]] or [[סְעָרָה]].
